applicant-name.name: HARBIN INSTITUTE OF TECH SHENZHEN SHENZHEN INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE AND TECH INNOVATION HARBIN INSTITUTE
哈尔滨工业大学（深圳）（哈尔滨工业大学深圳科技创新研究院）

invention-title: L12-phase reinforced Cr-Fe-Co-Ni-based high-entropy alloy and preparation method thereof
一种L12相强化型Cr-Fe-Co-Ni基高熵合金及其制备方法

abstract.p: The invention provides an L12-phase reinforced Cr-Fe-Co-Ni-based high-entropy alloy and a preparation method thereof, and belongs to the technical field of high-entropy alloys. The invention provides an L12-phase reinforced Cr-Fe-Co-Ni-based high-entropy alloy, which is mainly prepared from the following components in atomic percent: 0 to 45 percent of Co, 0 to 35 percent of Ni, 0 to 20 percent of Cr, 0 to 20 percent of Fe, 0 to 10 percent of W, 0 to 8 percent of Mo, 0 to 8 percent of Al and 0 to 4 percent of Ti, and the sum of the atomic percent is 100 percent. The high-entropy alloy has excellent hydrogen embrittlement resistance while keeping high strength and high plasticity, the yield strength of the high-entropy alloy can be larger than 700 MPa, the tensile strength of the high-entropy alloy can be larger than 1100 MPa, the percentage elongation after fracture of the high-entropy alloy can be larger than 25%, and the high-entropy alloy can be applied to the field of hydrogen energy such as new energy automobiles and power plants.

本发明提供了一种L12相强化型Cr‑Fe‑Co‑Ni基高熵合金及其制备方法，属于高熵合金技术领域。本发明提供的L12相强化型Cr‑Fe‑Co‑Ni基高熵合金，所述Cr‑Fe‑Co‑Ni基高熵合金按原子百分比主要由Co：0～45％、Ni：0～35％、Cr：0～20％、Fe：0～20％、W：0～10％、Mo：0～8％、Al：0～8％和Ti：0～4％组成，以上各原子百分比的总和为100％。本发明提供的高熵合金在保持着高强度、高塑性的同时，具备优异的氢脆抗性，其屈服强度可大于700MPa，抗拉强度可大于1100MPa，断后延伸率可大于25％，可以应用于氢能源领域，如新能源汽车、发电厂等。
